test-case.name: hexBinary-lt-1
test-case.description: Purpose: Evaluates The "op:hexBinary-less-than" operator with the arguments set as follows: $value1 = xs:hexBinary(lower bound) $value2 = xs:hexBinary(lower bound)

test-case.name: hexBinary-lt-2
test-case.description: Purpose: Evaluates The "op:hexBinary-less-than" operator with the arguments set as follows: $value1 = xs:hexBinary(mid range) $value2 = xs:hexBinary(lower bound)
